items.title: Should I buy gold in case the financial system implodes? I’m 62, retired and worried.
items.description: If things go poorly for the world, this reader wants to grab the gold and keep going.

items.title: Tepper, Burry bet big on Alibaba, and now they’re getting rewarded
items.description: Big-name investors who bet big on Alibaba got rewarded on Thursday as the Chinese conglomerate reported better-than-expected earnings.

items.title: Satya Nadella says he’s not an economist — and proved it with this common misconception
items.description: Microsoft Chairman and Chief Executive Satya Nadella said in an interview released Wednesday that he’s not an economist. And then he showed why.
